caption.title: Map of the study region.
caption.p: (A) Location of the Caribbean region within the Americas, (B) Archipelago of islands making up the Caribbean and their location within Meso-America. (C) Location of Dominica (purple) and Barbados (green) within the islands in the region. This map was created using freely available country boundary datafrom GADM.org, rendered in ArcGIS. Image files were created using GIMP freeware.
